statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date, purchase_amount FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, customer_id, product_category FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory WHERE purchase_amount > 100;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id, product_category FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_purchase_amount FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_purchase_amount > 500;
SELECT * FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_purchase_amount FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_purchase_amount > 500 ORDER BY total_purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT product_category, AVG(purchase_amount) AS avg_purchase_amount FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory GROUP BY product_category HAVING avg_purchase_amount < 100 ORDER BY product_category ASC;

SELECT product_id, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_purchase_amount FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_purchase_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT product_category FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory WHERE purchase_amount > 500 ORDER BY product_category ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date, purchase_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE purchase_amount > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC, customer_age ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_age > 30 AND customer_email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date, purchase_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE purchase_amount > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(*) AS purchase_count FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name HAVING purchase_count > 3;

SELECT customers.customer_name, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_spent FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id GROUP BY customers.customer_name HAVING total_spent > 500 ORDER BY total_spent DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customers
SELECT name, email FROM customers
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers
SELECT * FROM purchases
SELECT date, total_amount FROM purchases
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM purchases ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM purchases GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_id, name, email, total_amount FROM purchases JOIN customers ON purchases.customer_id = customers.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM Customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customer WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Product ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT promotion_name, start_date, end_date FROM Promotion WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(purchase_id) AS total_purchases FROM PurchaseHistory GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_purchases > 5;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM Customer;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Product ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number, total_amount FROM Customer JOIN PurchaseHistory ON Customer.customer_id = PurchaseHistory.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM Promotion WHERE start_date < end_date;
SELECT customer_name, email, purchase_date, total_amount FROM Customer JOIN PurchaseHistory ON Customer.customer_id = PurchaseHistory.customer_id ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE birthdate > '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_timestamp DESC;
SELECT products.name, products.price, orders.quantity FROM products JOIN orders ON products.product_id = orders.product_id;
SELECT promotion_id, description FROM promotions WHERE start_date <= current_date AND end_date >= current_date;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customers WHERE birthdate > '1990-01-01';

SELECT p.name, o.quantity, pr.category FROM products p INNER JOIN orders o ON p.product_id = o.product_id INNER JOIN purchases pu ON o.purchase_id = pu.purchase_id INNER JOIN promotions pr ON pu.purchase_timestamp BETWEEN pr.start_date AND pr.end_date;
SELECT c.name, COUNT(o.order_id) AS total_orders FROM customers c LEFT JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id LEFT JOIN orders o ON p.purchase_id = o.purchase_id GROUP BY c.name;
SELECT p.name, AVG(o.quantity) AS avg_quantity FROM products p INNER JOIN orders o ON p.product_id = o.product_id GROUP BY p.name HAVING avg_quantity > 5;
